author: Special Correspondent
text:
Nilgiri Mountain Railway train will halt for 10 minutes at Runnimedu on its return journey from Udhagamandalam for water filling and checks, according to an official.

The train stops at Runnimedu on its onward journey to Udhagamandalam. From Friday, the halt was started for the journey from Udhagamandalam too.
title: Train halt
